Key Match Events: Lautaro Martínez scored the opening goal in the 47th minute
Lautaro Martínez scored the second goal in the 86th minute
Argentina controlled possession (74%) for the third straight match
Argentina had six shots on goal, while being held scoreless in the first half for the third straight match
Pre-Game Insights: Lionel Messi did not play as he nurses a leg injury
Argentina coach Lionel Scaloni was absent due to suspension
Argentina had nine changes to its starting lineup
Most fans cheered for Argentina while wearing different versions of Messi’s No. 10 jersey
Post-Match Reflections: Lautaro Martínez said, 'I went to hug Leo for everything he means to us'
Lautaro Martínez said, 'Every time I wear this shirt I enjoy it'
Argentina assistant Walter Samuel said, 'I talked to him, and he’s getting better'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Canada played Chile to a scoreless draw in another Group A match on Saturday in Orlando, Florida, to also advance to the next round
Argentina will face the runner-up of Group B on Thursday at Houston
Argentina won all three of its matches in group play
Argentina hoisted the championship trophy in 2021 after beating Brazil 1-0 in the title game
